text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After Narita Brian experiences a<n>sudden, sharp pain in her
leg, we rush<n>her to the hospital for an examination.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There, we learn that the cause is<n>arthritis in her hip, and that
she won't<n>be able to race for several months.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ahhh, that was a good run! Time for a<n>much-needed rest.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, take a five-minute break, then<n>we'll move on to start
drills.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I should mention, with this spring's<n>Tenno Sho getting close,
reporters<n>have started coming again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Normally, I would expect them to be<n>here for Brian since she
was<n>scheduled for the race, but that's not<n>the case
anymore...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm happy she's not gravely hurt, but<n>she'll be
recuperating through spring,<n>won't she?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Nothing wrong with taking a break.<n>She'll be back to
crushing the<n>competition in no time!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hey, you there!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: What's the commotion?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: What's the commotion?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
"What's the commotion"?! Isn't<n>Brian injured?! So why's
she training<n>at the gym?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: What?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Exhale...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Brian! You're in no condition to be<n>training right now!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It's my leg that's hurt. The rest of my<n>body is perfectly fine.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I know that, but you need to rest!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
There are still things I can do. You<n>know racing is no simple
game you<n>can win without working for it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
And I'm racing to win. I run to get to<n>the finish before
anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Brian's always been an insatiable<n>runner. It seems not
even her injury<n>can change that.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I'm still worried though. If your<n>condition gets too bad, I'll
be forced to<n>stop you from racing.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I'm still worried though. If your<n>condition gets too bad, I'll
be forced to<n>stop you from racing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So are you going to stop me doing<n>this training too?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No, a trainer's responsibility is to<n>support their racers. I
respect your<n>feelings more than anything.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
No, a trainer's responsibility is to<n>support their racers. I
respect your<n>feelings more than anything.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You can train while recovering, but I<n>want to be around to
supervise<n>everything. We'll explore our options<n>and
prepare for your comeback race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Huh... Fine.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With Brian unable to run, we start a<n>new, special training
regimen for her.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Doing core training will let us<n>strengthen your inner muscles.
This'll<n>prevent atrophy while your joints are<n>still
recovering.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Exhale... That's three sets. Howmany more should I do?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: We'll rest in between, but let's do six<n>more.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Got it. I'll do triple that.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Triple?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
While your pain's subsided, it's still<n>too early to run. So
starting today,<n>we're going to strengthen your legs<n>in the
pool. That'll put less weight on<n>them.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Got it. Let me just get some tires to<n>tie to my body while I
swim.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Tires?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
That'll increase water resistance,<n>right? I'm trying to
increase muscle<n>strength, not maintain it.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Only you'd come up with an idea like<n>that... But hey, let's try
it!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Only you'd come up with an idea like<n>that... But hey, let's try
it!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Today we're finally ready to get back<n>to running!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Today we're finally ready to get back<n>to running!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But I need you to take it easy.<n>There's less impact on the
dirt, so<n>we'll start there to settle back into<n>things
gradually.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You've been practically glued to my<n>side since my injury.
What about the<n>others?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Don't worry, I'm watching everyone<n>else too.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Besides, your training is just as<n>interesting to watch as
your racing.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Besides, your training is just as<n>interesting to watch as
your racing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You're a strange one to get a kick out<n>of watching someone
train. If that's<n>the case, I hope you won't mind<n>staying
until sunset.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She makes no compromises with her<n>workouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What attracts her fans might not just<n>be her strength, but
her endless<n>hunger to win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Finally, the day comes when Brian is<n>back to her normal
routine.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
How long were you gonna keep us<n>waiting? I know you've
been itching<n>to go hog wild, you wacky wonder!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Did the doctor say this is okay?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, the inflammation's subsided,<n>so it's no problem.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, the inflammation's subsided,<n>so it's no problem.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And I've been watching her this<n>whole time. She doesn't
seem to be<n>feeling the injury or other pain.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Sweet, time to get your run on!<n>Brian's off to the races!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Watching you train hard through the<n>whole recovery
process, I've been<n>reminded just how much you want to<n>
win.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Watching you train hard through the<n>whole recovery
process, I've been<n>reminded just how much you want to<n>
win.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And just like Golshi said, we've<n>been waiting for this day!
Time to<n>make up for all the time you've been<n>held back!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And just like Golshi said, we've<n>been waiting for this day!
Time to<n>make up for all the time you've been<n>held back!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't have to tell me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The fearless runner dashes down the<n>track with an intense
momentum.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
How will she race in the fall? I can't<n>help but start getting
excited again.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Nothing is ever easy, is it?
